### üíº What I Do

- Develop full stack applications using **MERN Stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)
- Build cross-platform mobile apps using **React Native** & **FlutterFlow**
- Design and implement **RESTful APIs** and reusable frontend components
- Integrate third-party services and SDKs
- Deploy scalable apps on **AWS (EC2, S3, CloudFront, Route 53)** with **CI/CD pipelines**
- Collaborate with teams, communicate with clients, and drive feature development from concept to production
